item.title: [DISTRELEC-5313] DE // Search is not working for Service Plus items

https://test.distrelec.de/de/7007AB-1250175-3M---7007AB/p/serviceplus/90000314https://test.distrelec.de/de/7007AB-1250175-3M---7007AB/p/serviceplus/90000314

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5308] SEO - Redirection issue - rel="alternate" - 302 on category pages
item.description:
Observations :

  • With the tiquet https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4590 the alternate meta tag functionnality have been implemented on everyweb pages.
  • On category pages, the alternate look like this :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="x-default"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="en-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="de-ch"/>
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513" hreflang="fr-ch"/>
  • The alternate url are always using the language content of the origin url for integration simplicity purpose (it has to be optimized in a second tiquet).
  • The redirection from those wrongly rewritten url content to the right one is an http 302 on the categories pages.
    Exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513 -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/c/cat-L1D_379513

Impacts :

  • On category alternate url, the page weight is not correctly transmitted through the 302 redirection, which will highly impact the advantage of the alternate tag.

Demands :

  • Change ASAP the 302 redirection into 301.

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Redirection issue - rel="alternate" - 302 on category pages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The http status code has been set to 301 in case of category redirection.

Unfortunally it's not possible, at least in the short period, to have the localized category name in the alternate urls.

Thank you very much Francesco.
For the optimization of the url we will see in a second tiquet.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3218] Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements
item.description:
For all Webtrekk Teaser-Tracking implementations (compare WT-Spec chapter 9) the following functional amendment (Event-Tracking – compare WT-Spec chapter 8.2 p. 18/19) is required regarding click-event on any teaser-elements:

"onclick=wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'[[Teaser-Tracking ID]]',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Thereby two Webtrekk-requests are fired when a user is clicking on any teaser-element.

Briefly pre-discussed the above requirements with Dominic Modalek via phone (12.2.14).

Thanks! Mark
item.summary: Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Estimate 3 Days Frontend Work. No Backend Work needed.

This change affects many different components and therefore needs some time to implement and test.
Reconsider after go-live of 1.1

Mark, I assign it to you until this will be reconsidered again.

Info: only track onClick, not on shifting to the left or right in a carousel.

Hi Florian

To be foreseen for v1.3 if possible.

Thx Mark
Could you please check with Dominic what it needs do be done?

Dominic,
can you do a rough effort estimation for planning?

I estimate 3 - 4 days for this change.

Mainly because there are so many different modules involved that must be changed and tested. See Chapter 8 https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation for an Overview.

Florian,
please evaluate the priority of this task (in the context of FE bugs, FF improvements and ELFA development)

Please allocate and assign accordingly.

Thx Mark

Implemented. See 9.3 Click on Teaser Items - Always activated:

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation

Tested every occurence with a HTTP Sniffer and all IDs seem to be transmitted correctly. Only the "Feedback Campaign" Product Teaser could not be tested locally, so please don't forget to test it on the Q System.

@ Dominic -> Fix Version?

Thx Mark

Hi Dominic,

I have tested the implementation on distrelec.at. On the Homepage (Carpet) on click on a teaser-item two requests are transmitted (as required - compare attached screenshots): A request showing the click-event (ck524: 1) and another one transmitting the ct-parameter.
Please note that if the teaser is not containing a product, the image-name is so far not transmitted as part of the ct-parameter value (compare red arrow in screenshot).

Other Teaser-implementations such onsite-search overview (e.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone) and 'Ähnliche Produkte' respectively 'Kunden, die diesen Artikel gekauft haben, kauften auch' (e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Office-2013-Professional-eng-Microsoft-269-16093/p/11063276) do onclick not transmitting a request containing a ct-parameter. Besides a request containing the click-event (ck524: 1) is not transmitted.

Please verify and refactor accordingly.

Bests, Mark

Hello Mark, we need some explanation regarding this ticket.

  • Why currently there is some webtrekk argument in the URL of the banner image here?: http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone
    If you inspect the element you can find: &wt_mc=at.faf-c.de.-
    This is not suppose to be there, is it?
  • This URL comes from CMS cockpit, so we can't modify it.

+ we can fix the carpet-item-teaser errors regarding the wrong "data-teasertrackingid" element.

Hi Ruben

As far as I am aware this has so far been manually added to the target-link by Daniela Truttmann (Fact-Finder Business-Owner) to have a tracking-indication for that functionality.
As soon as the teaser-tracking for Fact-Finder Feedback-Campaigns (I have assigned you DISTRELEC-3415 as well in this regard) is fully and properly implemented, we can inform Daniela that she does not need to add the mentioned parameter via CMS any longer.

Next to the carpet-item-teaser errors I would like to ask you to investigate into every teaser-tracking implementation (please align with Dominic in this regard) and check whether all specified parameters are transmitted given an according behaviour (view, click etc.). As indicated e.g. so far Views are not yet properly tracked for the Hero-teaser items. If required you can set-up a meeting with Dominic and me (-> to be coordinated by Florian).

Thx Mark

Please estimate the effort.
Thx

Refactoring-scope of ticket according to the attached .xls-file.

Mark

As discussed I adapted the refactoring-scope of this ticket (compare attached .xls-file: Distrelec_Webtrekk_Teaser-Tracking-Implementierung_Overview_MDI_v1.1_14-08-27.xlsx).

Mark
Ruben, could you reestimate the ticket based on the change we have disccused with Mark Diggelmann.

Hello Mark,
please test after the next Q deployment
Thanks!

Hi Mark,

I have a question regarding the teaser / title click tracking of the product listing:

I assume, that the tracking should also work for products loaded by a click on the show more button or the technical switch buttons? Because so far we only implemented the tracking for products loaded by a standard page load and not by ajax..

BR Jan

Hi Jan

Thanks for your input. That's correct. The teaser-tracking shall be accordingly implemented for products loaded by Ajax.

Mark

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.at (v2.0.25). Three remaining issues:

  • Product listings: The teaser-tracking shall be accordingly implemented for products loaded by Ajax (compare input from Jan Widmer above).
    On click (on image/title/table) the ct-request is triggered however with a wrong ID (e.g. '.770111.' -> required for .at: 'at.ons.770111.') and the click itself is not tracked so far.

http://test.distrelec.at/de/Galaxy-S4-active-I9295-schwarz-16-GB-Samsung-GT-I9295ZAA/p/11056417

  • Image-gallery: Upon click on a 'large' image no click-request is triggered so far.
  • Ähnliche Produkte / Zubehör: By clicking on the title the click is not tracked and the ct-request not triggered so far.

Please verify and refactor accordingly

Thx Mark

Please verify the remaining 3 issues after the next deployment.
Thanks
Ruben
Can we close this?

No this must be (re-) tested on v2.0.28.

Mark

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.ch (v2.0.28). One remaining issue:

  • Product listings: The teaser-tracking shall be accordingly implemented for products loaded by Ajax (compare input from Jan Widmer above).
    On click (on image/title/table) the ct-request is triggered however with a wrong ID (e.g. 'ch.ons...' -> required for .at: 'ch.ons.770111.') and the click itself is still not tracked so far.

Mark

Tested locally, apparently fine for products loaded by Ajax: Technical View, Show More Products, and Filters.
Please see attachment and test in Atos.
Thanks

Tested and verified in Atos (test.a.distrelec.de, v3.0.m12). Compare attach screenshot in this regard, verify and refactor accordingly.

Mark

Sorry Mark,
I forgot to mention the resolution version: v3.0.m13
Please test when is deployed
Thanks

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.ch (v3.0.m15).

  • ct-request (on image/title/table): Triggered / ID correct

Remaining issue:

Please verify and refactor.

Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks,
Ruben

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.ch (v3.0.m19).

Issue still remaining (regarding loaded products by Ajax at product listings):

click-tracking: So far only working for a click on table. So far not yet for image- and title-links.

Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark

The tags are the same in the Table than in the Title/Image, and the webtrekk call is exactly the same. But for some reason is still not working:

<div class="table" ...

data-teasertrackingid="ch.faf-s.plg.765391.-"
data-position="9"
data-wt-teaser="{ ct: 'ch.faf-s.plg.765391.', ck: { 520: '9', 521: 'ch.faf-s.plg.765391.', 526: '1', 527:''}}">

<a class="title-link" ...

data-teasertrackingid="ch.faf-s.plg.765391.-"
data-position="9"
data-wt-teaser="{ ct: 'ch.faf-s.plg.765391.', ck: { 520: '9', 521: 'ch.faf-s.plg.765391.', 526: '1', 527:''}}">
